title: Ep 15: Advice - All Your Questions About Ruts!  (Seems Like We're All In One???)
itunes:title: Ep 15: Advice - All Your Questions About Ruts!  (Seems Like We're All In One???)
description:
In today's advice episode, we are talking about RUTS! We put the call out for questions on Instagram and were blown away by how many questions we got. We weren't able to answer them all but are tackling a bunch of them today!

We also talk about the agony of dating in New York, our obsessions, and our favorites on Instagram (@thisisnewmoney and @designboom) + what we are reading right now.

Articles referenced in this episode:

Becca's post about burnout (so good!) and Grace's post about a day in the life // setting a routine!

Join us on July 11th for our next book club pick: A Million Junes by Emily Henry.

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
